main.name: Bhavin Shah
main.bio: Aspiring Information Technology Specialist with a Cybersecurity degree at Kean University. Inventive, multi-tasking, and organized IT specialist with technical skills of MS Office, Adobe Creative Cloud, etc. and knowledge of detail-oriented production plans that accomplish project goals. I am excited for opportunities and challenges that will not only better my work, but also myself.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me by phone or email

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my favorite tools and technologies to work with

education.description: Here I took my Bacholors in Information Tecnology with a Cybersecurity Specialty and achieved a more thorough understanding of the concepts and science behind complex programming and security on the web. During this journey, I discovered my passion for developing scalable applications (web and mobile) and the security behind computer and application systems.
Software Eningeering courses in the areas of React development and Javascript programming. These courses helped me to furter my understanding of web development and strive to achieve my career goals.

Software Engineering Training focused around Web Development languages, SQL, and Java. This included five projects designed to challenge, assess, and implement all of the material from the lectures and transform them into usable applications.

work.title: Desktop Support Engineer
work.description: While working for NBCU I performed a ranged of tasks including, but not limited to, imaging laptops, Mac software installation, domain management, VPN configuration, secure discarding of sensitive data, and troubleshooting.

work.title: Web Designer
work.description: Collaborated with clients to create a UI/UX design for an commerce site that they were looking to build

skills.name: ReactJs
skills.description: React is by far my framework of choice for developing front end UI design. This site itself is made possible by using React.

skills.name: NodeJs
skills.description: The bulk of my experience has been with Node JS and it is my server-side scripting language of choice.

skills.name: SASS
skills.description: SASS is provides a new way of thinking when developing CSS. I find that nesting and using partials make it easier to keep track of whats changing with CSS, especially when used on larger projects.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: Figma
skills.description: Figma is by far one of favorite tools to use when prototyping a new UI design. I find this tool to be perfect for me to express my creative vision.

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: I was introduced to Swift while creating an iOS app for my University Senior Capstone Project. I sought out to challenge myself to learn a new programming language and in the end, i discovered a new interest in developing mobile applicaions.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: MongoDB has proved to suit my needs when I began to get interested in MERN Full Stack Development due to its ease of use and its enjoyable to work with

skills.name: SQL
skills.description: MySQL was my first introduction to a relational database system when I created a project while during my time in University.
